tool.name: ofile-typeparam
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re #import os
## Preprocessing mkdir mandatory_noformat && #if "optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir optional_noformat && #end if mkdir mandatory_multformat && #if "optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir optional_multformat && #end if mkdir mandatory_noformat_adv && #if "optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir optional_noformat_adv && #end if mkdir mandatory_multformat_adv && #if "optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir optional_multformat_adv && #end if mkdir decoy_input_noformat && ln -s '$decoy_input_noformat' 'decoy_input_noformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $decoy_input_noformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($decoy_input_noformat.ext)' && mkdir decoy_input_oneformat && ln -s '$decoy_input_oneformat' 'decoy_input_oneformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $decoy_input_oneformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($decoy_input_oneformat.ext)' && mkdir decoy_input_multformat && ln -s '$decoy_input_multformat' 'decoy_input_multformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $decoy_input_multformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($decoy_input_multformat.ext)' && mkdir test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat && #if "sect_optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir test_section_sect_optional_noformat && #end if mkdir test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat && #if "sect_optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir test_section_sect_optional_multformat && #end if mkdir test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat_adv && #if "sect_optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir test_section_sect_optional_noformat_adv && #end if mkdir test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat_adv && #if "sect_optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir test_section_sect_optional_multformat_adv && #end if mkdir test_section.sect_decoy_input_noformat && ln -s '$test_section.sect_decoy_input_noformat' 'test_section.sect_decoy_input_noformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $test_section.sect_decoy_input_noformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($test_section.sect_decoy_input_noformat.ext)' && mkdir test_section.sect_decoy_input_oneformat && ln -s '$test_section.sect_decoy_input_oneformat' 'test_section.sect_decoy_input_oneformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $test_section.sect_decoy_input_oneformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($test_section.sect_decoy_input_oneformat.ext)' && mkdir test_section.sect_decoy_input_multformat && ln -s '$test_section.sect_decoy_input_multformat' 'test_section.sect_decoy_input_multformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $test_section.sect_decoy_input_multformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($test_section.sect_decoy_input_multformat.ext)' &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -mandatory_noformat 'mandatory_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #if "optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -optional_noformat 'optional_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #end if -mandatory_multformat 'mandatory_multformat/output.${mandatory_multformat_type}' #if "optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -optional_multformat 'optional_multformat/output.${optional_multformat_type}' #end if -mandatory_noformat_adv 'mandatory_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #if "optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -optional_noformat_adv 'optional_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #end if -mandatory_multformat_adv 'mandatory_multformat_adv/output.${adv_opts_cond.mandatory_multformat_adv_type}' #if "optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -optional_multformat_adv 'optional_multformat_adv/output.${adv_opts_cond.optional_multformat_adv_type}' #end if -decoy_input_noformat 'decoy_input_noformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $decoy_input_noformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($decoy_input_noformat.ext)' -decoy_input_oneformat 'decoy_input_oneformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $decoy_input_oneformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($decoy_input_oneformat.ext)' -decoy_input_multformat 'decoy_input_multformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $decoy_input_multformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($decoy_input_multformat.ext)' -test_section:sect_mandatory_noformat 'test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #if "sect_optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -test_section:sect_optional_noformat 'test_section_sect_optional_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #end if -test_section:sect_mandatory_multformat 'test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat/output.${test_section.sect_mandatory_multformat_type}' #if "sect_optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -test_section:sect_optional_multformat 'test_section_sect_optional_multformat/output.${test_section.sect_optional_multformat_type}' #end if -test_section:sect_mandatory_noformat_adv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #if "sect_optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -test_section:sect_optional_noformat_adv 'test_section_sect_optional_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #end if -test_section:sect_mandatory_multformat_adv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat_adv/output.${test_section.sect_mandatory_multformat_adv_type}' #if "sect_optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -test_section:sect_optional_multformat_adv 'test_section_sect_optional_multformat_adv/output.${test_section.sect_optional_multformat_adv_type}' #end if -test_section:sect_decoy_input_noformat 'test_section.sect_decoy_input_noformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $test_section.sect_decoy_input_noformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($test_section.sect_decoy_input_noformat.ext)' -test_section:sect_decoy_input_oneformat 'test_section.sect_decoy_input_oneformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $test_section.sect_decoy_input_oneformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($test_section.sect_decoy_input_oneformat.ext)' -test_section:sect_decoy_input_multformat 'test_section.sect_decoy_input_multformat/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $test_section.sect_decoy_input_multformat.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($test_section.sect_decoy_input_multformat.ext)' #if len(str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',')) == 0 | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing && mv 'mandatory_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$mandatory_noformat' #if "optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'optional_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$optional_noformat' #end if && mv 'mandatory_multformat/output.${mandatory_multformat_type}' '$mandatory_multformat' #if "optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'optional_multformat/output.${optional_multformat_type}' '$optional_multformat' #end if && mv 'mandatory_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$mandatory_noformat_adv' #if "optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'optional_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$optional_noformat_adv' #end if && mv 'mandatory_multformat_adv/output.${adv_opts_cond.mandatory_multformat_adv_type}' '$mandatory_multformat_adv' #if "optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'optional_multformat_adv/output.${adv_opts_cond.optional_multformat_adv_type}' '$optional_multformat_adv' #end if && mv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat' #if "sect_optional_noformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'test_section_sect_optional_noformat/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$test_section_sect_optional_noformat' #end if && mv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat/output.${test_section.sect_mandatory_multformat_type}' '$test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat' #if "sect_optional_multformat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'test_section_sect_optional_multformat/output.${test_section.sect_optional_multformat_type}' '$test_section_sect_optional_multformat' #end if && mv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$test_section_sect_mandatory_noformat_adv' #if "sect_optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'test_section_sect_optional_noformat_adv/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$test_section_sect_optional_noformat_adv' #end if && mv 'test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat_adv/output.${test_section.sect_mandatory_multformat_adv_type}' '$test_section_sect_mandatory_multformat_adv' #if "sect_optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'test_section_sect_optional_multformat_adv/output.${test_section.sect_optional_multformat_adv_type}' '$test_section_sect_optional_multformat_adv' #end if #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

data.name: optional_noformat
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: optional_noformat
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "optional_noformat_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: optional_multformat
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: optional_multformat
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "optional_multformat_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: optional_noformat_adv
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: optional_noformat_adv
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: optional_multformat_adv
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: optional_multformat_adv
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: test_section_sect_optional_noformat
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: test_section:sect_optional_noformat
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "sect_optional_noformat_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: test_section_sect_optional_multformat
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: test_section:sect_optional_multformat
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "sect_optional_multformat_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: test_section_sect_optional_noformat_adv
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: test_section:sect_optional_noformat_adv
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "sect_optional_noformat_adv_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: test_section_sect_optional_multformat_adv
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: test_section:sect_optional_multformat_adv
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "sect_optional_multformat_adv_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Output File parameter tests-typeparam.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/unavailable.html
